strings.string: File uploaded at question "%1$s" must be no larger than %2$s
File uploaded at question "%1$s" must be no smaller than %2$s
Uploaded file must be no larger than %s
Uploaded file must be no smaller than %s

Please note that your PHP configuration specifies a maximum file upload size of %s. If you enter a larger value than this then be aware that the configuration setting will override it. Comparison values for the file size rule this can be entered in shorthand notation: 'K' or 'KB' for kilobytes, 'M' or 'MB' for megabytes. MySource Matrix regards each KB as 1024 bytes, each MB as 1024 KB.
